Posts.Content: I am 17 years old and have been have really bad throbbing pain in my right breast for five days now and today I felt around both of my breast and found a very tender spot on my right breast on the side of it.. It is very painful to the touch and even when it's not being touched also when I felt around, I felt a small little hard ball in between the big tender spot it is mobile but right now but hurts to bad to touch, it feels like I have a huge bruise inside my whole boob, it also kinda of feels swollen due to the tenderness, in my left boob I felt nothing, not sure what I should do?
Posts.Title: (No Subject)
